description: This file defines the main user interface for a Tic Tac Toe game using SwiftUI, including the ContentView struct which manages the game board, status display, and reset button, and a CellButton view component for individual cells.

classes.name: ContentView
classes.description: Main view struct for the Tic Tac Toe game UI, controls game display, user interactions, and links to the view model.

classes.name: CellButton
classes.description: A SwiftUI View representing an individual cell on the game board, displaying the cell's title and styling based on game state.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Defines the main UI layout of the ContentView, including the game title, status text, game board grid, and reset button.

methods.name: board
methods.description: Computed property that constructs the grid layout for the game cells.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Defines the layout and appearance of an individual CellButton.
